name: Megapede
overview: Megapede is a simple Centipede clone developed by Paul Andrus and published by Skyles Electric Works in 1983. The game is all in ASCII/PETSCII characters. The horrible Megapede will twist and turn and writhe from the top of the screen to the bottom, and you must destroy it before it gets you. Oh yes, there are poisonous snails and other obstacles to watch out for, too!
